mapper.sql: OilCan, StoreTime, OilNo, StandardL, HeightTotal, OilL, HeightWater, WaterL, Temperature, VolumeEmpty, Temp1, Temp2, Temp3, Temp4, Temp5, Densities, DensitiesStandard, TranStatus, CreateTime, Shift
mapper.select: select t.* from (select from oss_monitor_TimeInventory where oilno=#{oilNo}order by createtime desc) t group by t.oilcan order by t.oilcan;
select t.* from (select from oss_monitor_TimeInventory where canno=#{canNo}order by createtime desc) t group by t.oilcan order by t.oilcan;
select from oss_monitor_TimeInventory where oilcan=#{canNo} order by createtime desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into oss_monitor_TimeInventory (OilCan, StoreTime, OilNo, StandardL, HeightTotal, OilL, HeightWater, WaterL, Temperature, VolumeEmpty, Temp1, Temp2, Temp3, Temp4, Temp5, Densities, DensitiesStandard, TranStatus, CreateTime, Shift) values (#{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volumeempty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temp1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temp2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temp3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temp4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temp5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{densities,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{densitiesstandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update oss_monitor_TimeInventory
OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StandardL = #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightTotal = #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OilL = #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
VolumeEmpty = #{volumeempty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp1 = #{temp1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp2 = #{temp2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp3 = #{temp3,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp4 = #{temp4,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Temp5 = #{temp5,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Densities = #{densities,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DensitiesStandard = #{densitiesstandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER} and StoreTime = #{storetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update oss_monitor_TimeInventory set OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StandardL = #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightTotal = #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OilL = #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, VolumeEmpty = #{volumeempty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp1 = #{temp1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp2 = #{temp2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp3 = #{temp3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp4 = #{temp4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Temp5 = #{temp5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Densities = #{densities,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DensitiesStandard = #{densitiesstandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER} and StoreTime = #{storetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select:
select 'true' as QUERYID,
from oss_monitor_TimeInventory where StoreTime >= #{begin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}>=StoreTime
and OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY StoreTime DESC
